thread.section_title: Maison Albar Hotel Opera Diamond, BW Premier Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Review -
thread.title_full: Review - Review of Maison Albar Hotel Opera Diamond, BW Premier Collection, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Zacfallon
title: Review -
text:
Everything was truly brilliant. Lovely hotel and really cool designed rooms.Would definitely return when in Paris. Brilliant staff and service. I requested rose petals and that was prepared perfectly for our arrival.
Great location next to a central metro line and not far from the Arc de triomphe.
